songs.title: The Ice Ape
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I'm working on dying
Ay, yeah
Oogie Mane he killed it

[Verse 1: Keith Ape]
난 그냥 마음이 아퍼
그래서 필요해 아편
얼음이 컵과 손목에 담겨
육각수 wanna be diamonds
오늘 난 옷을 사버려
오늘 전부 다 피워버려
오늘 사랑스런 남편 안 쓰는
오늘 세상에 한꺼번에 피워버려
주먹엔 얼어버린 육각수, 얼음덩이, ice
All on my body, 그는 마치 서리
사람 같이 나의 손목 위에 얼어버린 서리
말아버린 3.5 gram짜리 원숭이 꼬리

[pre-Chorus]
이사는 Diamond on teeth, ayy
So that shit what I can see, yuh
I believe lean like a v, ayy
Blowing the gas like a breeze, yuh
I got your hoe on her knees, yuh
Yo bitch she fuck with my wrist, yuh
I think she fuck with my wrist, yuh
Fuck all that I gotta leave, ayy yuh
If I hit your town heavy city froze
VVS dancing heavy really cold
Backwood, it’s full of pepper gold
Skateboard P, OG Bape, really on me hoe

[Chorus: Keith Ape]
필요해 bounce it with it
Big box, aqua pool, big guap
[?] big [?]
Just finna ape shit loud
Ya [?]
Just finna ape shit loud
Ya [?]
필요해 bounce it with it
Big box, aqua pool, big guap
[?] big [?]
Just finna ape shit loud
Ya [?]
Just finna ape shit loud
Ya [?]

[Bridge: Keith Ape]
If I hit your town heavy city froze
VVS dancing heavy really cold
Backwood, it’s full of pepper gold
Skateboard P, OG Bape, really on me hoe

[Verse 2: Chief Keef]
She think that I'm an astronaut 'cause what's up on my shirt (what's up on my shirt)
She say that I am wavy, as I know how to surf, aye
But there was a fire in the desert in the earth
Come and turn your shit into a desert in disperse
Don't get hurt, go to church
Bitch my shoes is your bird
Follow, do not disturb
Fuck my coupe, on the curb
Got that uzi and a vert
Drop the tall 'cause I'm a cop
Know this bitch ain't got no play
Got the savage boys a lot
Yeah, aye, you smell the ramen in the air, aye (ramen in the air)
She told me something but I ain't care (I ain't care)
I'm just leanin' say how it feels, huh (how it feels, huh)
Lil K gotta chill, huh (lil K gotta chill)
Hit a nigga in his lips, huh (hit a nigga in his lips)
Slam a nigga on this gram, uh
They Lebron, you both Durant, huh (they Lebron, you both Durant)

[Chorus: Keith Ape]
필요해 bounce it with it
Big box, aqua pool, big guap
[?] big [?]
Just finna ape shit loud
Ya [?]
Just finna ape shit loud
Ya [?]
필요해 bounce it with it
Big box, aqua pool, big guap
[?] big [?]
Just finna ape shit loud
Ya [?]
Just finna ape shit loud
Ya [?]

[Outro]
I'm working on dying
